verse: Moses came along with Hoshea son of Nun and spoke all the words of this song in the hearing of the people.
Then when Moses had finished speaking all of these words to all Israel,
for it is not empty talk for you, because it is your life. By this word you will live long on the land that you are crossing the Jordan to possess.”
On this same day the Lord spoke to Moses:
“Go up to Mount Nebo, this mountain of the Abarim range, which is in the land of Moab opposite Jericho, and view the land of Canaan that I am giving to the people of Israel as a possession,
and die on the mountain that you are about to ascend and be gathered to your people, just as Aaron your brother died on Mount Hor and was gathered to his people.
This will happen because you broke faith with me among the people of Israel at the waters of Meribah Kadesh in the Wilderness of Zin, by not treating me as holy among the people of Israel.
You may view the land from a distance, but you will not go into the land that I am giving to the people of Israel.”
